comment:
* A utility class for issuing XPath error messages.
 * @xsl.usage internal

variables.name: XPATHBundle
variables.comment: The language specific resource object for XPath messages.

variables.name: XPATH_ERROR_RESOURCES
variables.comment: The class name of the XPath error message string table.

methods.name: public static final String createXPATHMessage(String msgKey, Object[] args)
methods.comment:
* Creates a message from the specified key and replacement
   * arguments, localized to the given locale.
   *
   * @param msgKey    The key for the message text.
   * @param args      The arguments to be used as replacement text
   *                  in the message created.
   *
   * @return The formatted message string.

methods.name: public static final String createXPATHWarning(String msgKey, Object[] args)
methods.comment:
* Creates a message from the specified key and replacement
   * arguments, localized to the given locale.
   *
   * @param msgKey The key for the message text.
   * @param args      The arguments to be used as replacement text
   *                  in the message created.
   *
   * @return The formatted warning string.

methods.name: public static final String createXPATHMsg(ListResourceBundle fResourceBundle, String msgKey, Object[] args)
methods.comment:
* Creates a message from the specified key and replacement
   * arguments, localized to the given locale.
   *
   * @param fResourceBundle The resource bundle to use.
   * @param msgKey  The message key to use.
   * @param args      The arguments to be used as replacement text
   *                  in the message created.
   *
   * @return The formatted message string.

methodNames: public static final String createXPATHMessage(String msgKey, Object[] args)
public static final String createXPATHWarning(String msgKey, Object[] args)
public static final String createXPATHMsg(ListResourceBundle fResourceBundle, String msgKey, Object[] args)
